sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getIncidentRecords</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>getIncidentRecords</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var getIncidentRecords = Class.create();
getIncidentRecords.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getAliveRecords: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('u_record_status');
        gr.addEncodedQuery('u_id=' + this.getParameter('sysparm_recID'));
        gr.query();
        while (!gr.next()) {
            gr.initialize();
            gr.u_status = this.getParameter('sysparm_status');
            gr.u_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_recID');
            gr.u_incident = this.getParameter('sysparm_recID');
			gr.sys_id = this.getParameter('sysparm_recID');
            gr.insert();
            return gr.u_incident.getDisplayValue();
        }
    },

    removeInactiveRecords: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('u_record_status');
        gr.addEncodedQuery('u_id=' + this.getParameter('sysparm_recID'))
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next())
        {
            gr.deleteRecord();
        }

    },

    type: 'getIncidentRecords'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2024-05-11 17:32:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6391352293060210b31a30dcebba1052</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>getIncidentRecords</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6391352293060210b31a30dcebba1052</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-05-11 18:39:34</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
